card.text: When Lagoros enters the battlefield, if it's not a token, create a tapped token that's a copy of it.

card.text: {T}, discard a card: Draw a card.

card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Whiptail Raptor gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: 25 Adiposaurus
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: 26 Arcanawalla
card.text: {3}: Arcanawalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: 27 Dodo
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: 28 Mastodon
card.text: You may assign Mastodon's damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.text: Reach

card.name: 30 Simius
card.text: When Simius enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of your next upkeep.

card.name: Amber
card.text: {T}, sacrifice this artifact: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.

card.name: Dimension Sifter
card.text: Flying, Haste UR, T: Draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you discard one or more double-faced cards, you may exile one of them. If you do, you may play that card this turn.

card.name: Parallelemental
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast or transform a double-faced card, put a +1/+1 counter on Parallelemental.

card.name: Adwa Juvenile
card.text: Fast-forward 4 (As a sorcery, 4: Put E on this. Transform at five.) --- (Back): Adwa Colossus

card.name: Adwa Colossus
card.text: Adwa Colossus has hexproof as long as it’s untapped. --- (Front): Adwa Juvenile

card.name: Amber Capsule
card.text: T: Add one mana of any color. 3, T, sacrifice Amber Capsule: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.

card.name: Hubristic Dominion
card.text: Counter target spell. 2, Discard Hubristic Dominion: Create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with 3, T, sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.)

card.name: Wormhole Cat
card.text: Whenever you cast or transform a double-faced card, add R. Until end of turn, this mana doesn’t empty as steps and phases end.

card.name: Starsurfer
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast or transform a double-faced card, you may have target creature phase out.

card.name: Bermuda Triangle
card.text: Whenever you play a double-faced card from your hand, copy its other face. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. (A a copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Galaxy Hatchling
card.text: Fast-forward 2UR (As a sorcery, 2UR: Put E on this. Transform at five.) Flying Whenever you put E on Galaxy Hatchling, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and you untap target permanent. --- (Back): Millennium Hellkite

card.name: Millennium Hellkite
card.text: Flying When this permanent transforms into Millennium Hellkite, take an extra turn after this one. That turn has an additional untap step and combat phase after its first combat phase. --- (Front): Galaxy Hatchling

card.name: Neon Eruption
card.text: X can’t be one, two, or three. Neon Eruption deals 2 plus X damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Prodigious Reader
card.text: Fast-forward 1U (As a sorcery, 1U: Put E on this. Transform at five.) Whenever you put E on Prodigious Reader, draw a card, then discard a card. --- (Back): Expert of the Field

card.name: Expert of the Field
card.text: When this permanent transforms into Expert of the Field, return up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. --- (Front): Prodigious Reader

card.name: Knobbed Clockbeast
card.text: Whenever you cast a double-faced spell or activate an ability on a double-faced permanent you control, Knobbed Clockbeast deals 1 damage to each opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Industrosaur
card.text: When Industrosaur enters the battlefield, add RRR.

card.name: Echo Pup
card.text: Fast-forward 1R (As a sorcery, 1R: Put E on this. Transform at five.) Whenever you put E on Echo Pup, it gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. --- (Back): Aeon Wolf

card.name: Aeon Wolf
card.text: First strike R: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. --- (Front): Echo Pup

card.name: Trap In an Hourglass
card.text: Tap target creature. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Bury in Sand

card.name: Bury in Sand
card.text: Return target tapped creature to its owner’s hand. --- (Front): Trap In an Hourglass

card.name: Read the Stars
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card. Foreshadow (Exile this. Cast its other face after your next untap without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Pull from the Planets

card.name: Pull from the Planets
card.text: Copy the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn. You may choose new targets for the copy. --- (Front): Read the Stars

card.name: Rush of Rage
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Blurred Vision

card.name: Blurred Vision
card.text: Up to two target creatures can’t block this turn. --- (Front): Rush of Rage

card.name: Memorize
card.text: Scry 2. Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Overwrite

card.text: Put the top or bottom card of your library into your hand. --- (Front): Memorize

card.name: Mud Trap

card.name: Encase in Amber

card.name: Family Reunion
card.text: Create X Amber tokens. (They’re artifacts with “3, T, sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”) Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Family Feud

card.name: Honored Ancestors
card.text: Flying Whenever you create one or more tokens, you gain 1 life and scry 1.

card.name: Livia, the Restorer
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many tokens instead. B, T, Sacrifice another nontoken creature: Create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”)

card.text: T: Add one mana of any color. 3, T, sacrifice Lyrian Telescope: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.

card.name: Museum Curator

card.name: Nesting Viper
card.text: Fast-forward 2 (As a sorcery, 2: Put E on this. Transform at five.) Deathtouch When Nesting Viper reaches EEE, search your Fossil deck for a token named Titanoboa, create it, then shuffle. (Titanoboa is a 1/2 black Fossil Snake with deathtouch.) --- (Back): Serpent Nest

card.name: Serpent Nest
card.text: Deathtouch, menace Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch attacks, each opponent loses 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you control no other Snakes, search your Fossil deck for a token named Titanoboa, create it, then shuffle. (Titanoboa is a 1/2 black Fossil Snake with deathtouch.) --- (Front): Nesting Viper

card.name: Outcompete
card.text: This spell costs 3 less to cast if you’ve created a token this turn. Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Paleo-Ontologist
card.text: When Paleo-Ontologist enters the battlefield, you may discard a card or sacrifice a creature. If you do, create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”)

card.name: Petroglyph Giant
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you created a token this turn, create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”)

card.name: Secondhand Blades
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste. Equipped creature has first strike as long as it’s attacking. Equip 2

card.text: Deathtouch --- (Front): Plunder the Tomb

card.name: Preserve
card.text: You gain 3 life. Create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”)

card.name: Spite

card.name: Timekeeper Assassin
card.text: When Timekeeper Assassin enters the battlefield, choose one: • Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. • Each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Time Eater
card.text: Lifelink 2, discard Time Eater: Create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”)

card.name: Unscrupulous Archaeologist
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, target creature you don’t control get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of tokens you created this turn.

card.name: Ambush Sloth
card.text: Ambush Sloth has first strike as long as it’s attacking. When Ambush Sloth enters the battlefield, create the top token of your Fossil deck. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Eonflame Phoenix
card.text: Flying When Eonflame Phoenix dies, create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, Sacrifice this artifact: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”) If you would create a token from your Fossil deck, you may pay R instead. If you do, return Eonflame Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Illegal Activity
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn. Untap it. 2, Discard Illegal Activity: Create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, Sacrifice this artifact: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”)

card.name: Evolutionary Adaptation
card.text: Search your Fossil deck for a token that shares a color with a mana spent to cast this spell. Create that token, then shuffle.

card.name: Antique Axe
card.text: When Antique Axe enters the battlefield, you may pay 2G. When you do, create the top token of your Fossil deck and attach Antique Axe to it. Equip 3 Equipped creature gets +2/+1.

card.name: Dinosaur Outriders
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a Fossil creature, Dinosaur Outriders gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Buried Treasures
card.text: Create two Amber tokens. (They’re artifacts with “3, T, Sacrifice this artifact: Create the top token of your Fossil deck tapped.”) Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, you may cast the other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Bounty of the Land

card.name: Bounty of the Land
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever you tap a land for mana, it produces an additional mana of that type. --- (Front): Buried Treasures

card.name: Disturbed Slumber
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. If it’s a Fossil creature, put two +1/+1 counters and a trample counter on it instead.

card.name: Nestwatcher Matriarch

card.text: Scry 2, then you may have each player draw a card. --- (Front): Protect the Timeline

card.text: Fast-forward 2 (As a sorcery, 2: Put E on this. Transform at five.) When Student of Sands reaches EEE, draw a card. --- (Back): Caerval Galemaster

card.name: Caerval Galemaster
card.text: Vigilance --- (Front): Student of Sands

card.name: Destiny Dodger
card.text: Flying, flash 2W: Destiny Dodger and target creature you control each phase out. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Back To My Roots
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, Sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck.) --- Add G. Until end of turn, this mana doesn’t empty as steps and phases end.

card.name: Tyvara, Angel of Bounty
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature you control gets a counter, you may give it an additional one of those counters. Whenever you create a token, you may create an additional one of those tokens. These abilities trigger only once each turn.

card.name: Return to the Fold
card.text: Return target creature with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If that creature has fast-forward, give it EEE. --- If your life total is greater than the total noted with Pep Talk, draw two cards.

card.name: Grazing Hypsodon
card.text: Grazing Hypsodon can’t be blocked by creature tokens.

card.name: Caerval Cadet
card.text: Fast-forward 3 (As a sorcery, 3: Put E on this. Transform at five.) Whenever Caerval Cadet attacks, put E on it. --- (Back): Caerval Captain

card.name: Caerval Captain
card.text: When this creature transforms into Caerval Captain, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn. --- (Front): Caerval Cadet

card.name: Erase From History
card.text: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner’s library. 2, Discard Erase From History: Create an Amber token. (It’s an artifact with “3, T, Sacrifice this: Create the top token of your Fossil deck.”)

card.name: Charmed Sundial
card.text: Permanents you control have ward 1 for each counter on them. W, T: You gain 1 life. You may remove a counter from a permanent you control. If you do, scry 1.

card.name: Development Elephant
card.text: When Development Elephant enters the battlefield, for each type of counter on target permanent, you may give that permanent another counter of that kind.

card.name: Taurum Calf
card.text: Fast-Forward 3 (3: Put E on this. Transform at five. Fast-forward as a sorcery.) As long as Taurum Calf has EEE or more, it gets +2/+2. --- (Back): Taurum Bull

card.name: Taurum Bull
card.text: When this permanent transforms into Taurum Bull, you gain 5 life. --- (Front): Taurum Calf

card.name: Tyvara's Silencer
card.text: W, T: Target nontoken creature phases out.

card.name: Fission Flash
card.text: Target creature phases out. Scry 1. Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Luster Spirit

card.name: Luster Spirit
card.text: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spells, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) --- (Front): Fission Flash

card.name: Edgewood Blessing
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, you may cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Edgewood Guardian

card.name: Edgewood Guardian
card.text: Vigilance --- (Front): Edgewood Blessing

card.name: Apprentice Duelist
card.text: Fast-forward 2 (As a sorcery, 2: Put E on this. Transform at five.) When you fast-forward Apprentice Duelist, another target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If Apprentice Duelist has EEE or more, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature instead. --- (Back): Master Instructor

card.name: Master Instructor
card.text: G/W, Remove E from Master Instructor: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. Until end of turn, that creature gains first strike and can’t be blocked by more than one creature. Activate only as a sorcery. --- (Front): Apprentice Duelist

card.name: Nurture
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If it has fast-forward, put E on it. Foreshadow (Exile this. After your next untap, cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Mature

card.name: Mature
card.text: Put E on each permanent you control with fast-forward and a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. --- (Front): Nurture

card.text: Whenever you fast-forward a permanent, give that permanent an additional E.

card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Skymare Mount attacks, put a flying counter on another target creature you control. --- (Front): Winged Filly

card.name: Viltravan Excavation
card.text: (T: Add B or R.) Viltravan Excavation enters the battlefield tapped if it’s the first, second, or third turn of the game.

card.name: Illusion of Scarcity
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Thought Crime
card.text: Target player reveals three cards from their hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Foreshadow (Exile this. At the beginning of your next upkeep, cast its other face without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Compulsory Reeducation

card.name: Compulsory Reeducation
card.text: Name a card. Target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with the chosen name. --- (Front): Thought Crime

card.name: Memorial to Fury
card.text: The first spell you cast each turn costs 1 less to cast. Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Memorial to Fury becomes a 4/4 red and black Elemental artifact creature with menace and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Accelerando
card.text: At the beginning of combat this turn, creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Dormant Elemental
card.text: When you cast your second spell each turn, Dormant Elemental gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Erupt
card.text: Erupt deals 3 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature’s controller.

card.name: Impatient Chronomancer
card.text: Whenever Impatient Chronomancer attacks, the next spell you cast this turn costs 1 less to cast.

card.name: Double Timer

card.name: Hired Muscle
card.text: When you cast your second spell each turn, target creature gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Make History
card.text: Exile target creature.

card.name: Unethical Augmentation
card.text: Enchant creature When Unethical Augmentation enters the battlefield, add BBB. Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

card.name: Nighthawk Avenger
card.text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink You can’t cast Nighthawk Avenger during your first, second, or third turns of the game.

card.name: Thousand Cuts
card.text: Thousand Cuts deals 1 damage to any target. At the beginning of your end step, if you cast two or more spells this turn, return Thousand Cuts from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Lamplight Researcher

card.name: Outsized Legacy
card.text: Enchant creature with mana value 2 or less Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink and protection from mana value 3 or greater. (This permanent can’t be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with mana value 3 or greater.)

card.name: Young Dinomancer
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create the top token of your Fossil deck.

card.name: Legend Lore
card.text: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may cast up to one creature spell and up to one noncreature spell not named Legend Lore with total mana value 5 or less from among them without paying their mana costs.
